summary: The diff implements both requirements. REQ-46 is addressed through a migration module that updates SidneiCosta00's credentials and role. REQ-47's frontend verification requirement is implicit in the backend implementation - the Master role assignment through access control system enables all admin permissions, though the diff lacks explicit frontend verification evidence.

missing_requirements.requirement: Verify that SidneiCosta00 with Master role has full access to all admin panel features including employee catalog, client credential editing, and all management operations
missing_requirements.reason: No frontend changes or test files are present in the diff to explicitly verify that the Employee Catalog section is visible, client credential editing features are enabled, or that all admin panel management operations are accessible when logged in as SidneiCosta00. The diff only shows backend changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Migration module that explicitly drops 'masterEmployee' field from old actor state
hallucinated_features.reason: The migration.mo file removes a 'masterEmployee' field that was not mentioned in the BuildRequest. The request only asked to update SidneiCosta00's credentials and role, not to remove any existing fields or refactor the data structure.
